<a name="_bclHeader1"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal" align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Calibri>&nbsp;
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></FONT></STRONG></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><STRONG><FONT face=Calibri></FONT></STRONG>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal">&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">FIRST HALF OF 2016 
RESULTS</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" color=black 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Derived from interim financial information
reviewed by independent auditors, stated in millions of U.S. dollars, prepared 
in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards - IFRS issued by 
the International Accounting Standards Board - IASB.</FONT></P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 170.1pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Rio de Janeiro &#8211; August 11, 
2016</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Main 
financial highlights 2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net income attributable to the 
shareholders of Petrobras of US$ 106 million, compared to net loss attributable 
to the shareholders of Petrobras of US$ 318 million in the 1Q-2016, as a result 
of:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=wingdings>&#167;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman"> </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">A decrease of 22% in net finance 
expenses; </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=wingdings>&#167;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman"> </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">An 7% increase of crude oil and 
natural gas total production;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=wingdings>&#167;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman"> </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Higher revenues with an increase of
14% in crude oil and oil products exports and lower costs related to natural gas
imports;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=wingdings>&#167;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman"> </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Expenses related to the new 
Voluntary Separation Incentive Plan (PIDV); and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=wingdings>&#167;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman"> </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Impairment losses related to 
Comperj assets. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The higher cash provided by 
operating activities and the decrease of capital expenditures and investments 
resulted in a positive free cash flow* for the fifth consecutive quarter of US$ 
3,073 million in the 2Q-2016, 4 times higher when compared to 1Q-
2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted EBITDA* of US$ 5,789 
million in the 2Q-2016, a 7% increase compared to the 1Q-2016. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross indebtedness decreased 2% in 
U.S. dollars, from US$ 126,262 million on December 31, 2015 to US$ 123,922 
million on June 30, 2016 (a US$ 2,340 million decrease). Net debt* increased 3% 
from US$ 100,425 million on December 31, 2015 to US$ 103,556 million on June 30,
2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The ratio between net debt and the 
Last Twelve Months (LTM) Adjusted EBITDA<FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face=Symbol><SUP>*</SUP></FONT></FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> increased from 4.41 as of December
31, 2015 to 5.18 as of June 30, 2016 and the leverage decreased from 60% to 55% 
in the same period.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The issuing of global notes 
totaling US$ 6.75 billion and the tender offer of US$ 6.3 billion generated the 
increase of average maturity of outstanding debt from 7.14 years as of December 
31, 2015 to 7.30 years as of June 30, 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Main 
operating highlights 2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Total crude oil and natural gas 
production was 2,804 thousand barrels of oil equivalent per day (boed), an 
increase of 7% compared to the 1Q-2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Domestic oil products output 
decreased 2% to 1,919 thousand barrels per day (bpd) and the domestic sales
increased 3% to 2,109 thousand bpd.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Crude oil and oil products exports 
increased 14% to 515 thousand bpd and average Brent price increased 34% to 
US$/bbl 45.57. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Reduction of 55% in LNG imports due
to higher domestic gas supply and lower thermoelectric demand.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=center>

align=center>&nbsp;</P>

align=center>&nbsp;</P>

align=center>&nbsp;</P>

Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the 
Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, that are subject to risks and 
uncertainties. The forward-looking statements, which address the Company&#8217;s
expected business and financial performance, among other matters, contain words 
such as &#8220;believe,&#8221; &#8220;expect,&#8221; &#8220;estimate,&#8221; 
&#8220;anticipate,&#8221; &#8220;optimistic,&#8221; &#8220;intend,&#8221; 
&#8220;plan,&#8221; &#8220;aim,&#8221; &#8220;will,&#8221; &#8220;may,&#8221; 
&#8220;should,&#8221; &#8220;could,&#8221; &#8220;would,&#8221; 
&#8220;likely,&#8221; and similar expressions. Readers are cautioned not to 
place undue reliance on these forward-looking statements, which speak only as of
the date on which they are made. There is no assurance that the expected events,
trends or results will actually occur. We undertake no obligation to publicly 
update or revise any forward-looking statements, whether as a result of new 
information or future events or for any other reason.</FONT></B></FONT></P>

style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 6pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-

those expressed or forecast in any forward-looking statements as a result of a 
variety of assumptions and factors. These factors include, but are not limited 
to, the following: (i) failure to comply with laws or regulations, including 
fraudulent activity, corruption, and bribery; (ii) the outcome of ongoing 
corruption investigations and any new facts or information that may arise in 
relation to the &#8220;Lava Jato Operation&#8221;; (iii) the effectiveness of 
the Company&#8217;s risk management policies and procedures, including 
operational risk; and (iv) litigation, such as class actions or proceedings 
brought by governmental and regulatory agencies.&nbsp; A description of other 
factors can be found in the Company&#8217;s Annual Report on Form 20-F for the 
year ended December 31, 2015, and the Company&#8217;s other filings with the 
U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.</FONT></B></FONT></P>

PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="9%">

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><SUP>
<FONT><U><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=white 
face=symbol>*</FONT></U></FONT></SUP></P>
<HR align=left SIZE=1 width="33%">
<DIV id=ftn2><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT color=#0000ff face=Symbol><SUP><FONT 
style="COLOR: #000000">*</FONT></SUP></FONT>&nbsp;See definition of Adjusted 
EBITDA in glossary and the respective reconciliation in Reconciliation of 
Adjusted EBITDA. </FONT></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>3</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_4"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader4"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">1H-2016 x 1H-2015 Results*<SUP>
<FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" face=Symbol></FONT></SUP></FONT></B><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">:</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Virtually all
revenues and expenses of our Brazilian operations are denominated and payable in
Brazilian Reais. When the Brazilian Real depreciates relative to the U.S. 
dollar, as it did in the 1H-2016 (a 25% depreciation), revenues and expenses 
decrease when translated into U.S. dollars. The depreciation of the Brazilian 
Real against the U.S. dollar affects the line items discussed below in different
ways.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross profit 
decreased by 26% to US$ 11,875 million in the 1H-2016 when compared to the 1H-
2015, mainly due to the effect of foreign exchange translation (depreciation of 
the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar). Excluding this effect, gross profit
decreased by 9% when expressed in Brazilian Reais, due to lower sales revenues, 
as a result of a 7% reduction of domestic oil products sales, partially offset 
by higher diesel and gasoline margins. The decreased sales revenues was also due
to lower crude oil and oil products export prices, to lower power generation, 
decreased electricity prices and the lower domestic natural gas sales 
volume.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">In the 1H-
2016, the Company experienced lower import costs and decreased production taxes 
in Brazil due to lower crude oil prices and decreased sales. However, higher 
depreciation expenses occurred as a result of a decrease in reserves estimates 
(mainly due to lower crude oil prices), which were partially offset by a lower 
carrying amount of assets that were impacted by impairment losses that were 
taken in 2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Operating income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating 
income was US$ 4,132 million in the 1H-2016, a 46% decrease when compared to the
1H-2015. Excluding the effect of foreign exchange translation, operating income 
decreased 32% in Brazilian Reais resulting from decreased gross profit, 
</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras
Sans,sans-serif">higher idleness expenses related to drilling rigs</FONT><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">, higher 
expenses with legal proceedings, expenses associated with the new Voluntary 
Separation Incentive Plan and with the return of exploratory blocks. In 
addition, the 1H-2015 was impacted by the reversal of impairment charge related 
to trade receivables from companies in the electricity sector.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">These effects
were partially offset by lower tax expenses. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Net finance expense</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net finance 
expense was US$ 3,950 million in the 1H-2016, compared to a net finance expense 
of US$ 3,932 million in the 1H-2015, remaining relatively flat. Excluding the 
effect of foreign exchange translation, net finance expense increased in 
Brazilian Reais </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">due to higher interest expenses as a result of 
higher debt and the effect of the depreciation of Brazilian Real against the 
U.S. dollar.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Net income (loss) attributable to the shareholders of 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net loss 
attributable to the shareholders of Petrobras of US$ 212 million in the 1H-2016,
compared to a net income of US$ 2,033 million in the 1H-2015, mainly due to 
lower operating income and to the effect of foreign exchange variation over the 
debt of structured companies in U.S. dollars, registered in net income 
attributable to non-controlling interests. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted EBITDA and Free Cash Flow </FONT></B><FONT 
style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: super"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
color=black face=symbol>**</FONT></B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Adjusted 
EBITDA was US$ 11,183 million in the 1H-2016, a 20% decrease compared to the 1H-
2015. The Adjusted EBITDA Margin reached 29% in the 1H-2016. The decrease of 
capital expenditures and investments resulted in a positive free cash flow of 
US$&nbsp;3,683 million in the 1H-2016. This result represents an important 
effort to deleverage the Company.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<HR align=left SIZE=1 width="33%">
<DIV id=ftn3><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><FONT 
color=#0000ff face=Symbol><SUP><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">*</FONT></SUP></FONT>&nbsp;Additional information about operating 
results of 1H-2016 x 1H-2015, see item 4.</FONT></P><FONT lang=PT-
BR></FONT></DIV>
<DIV id=ftn4><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><FONT 
color=#0000ff face=Symbol><SUP><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">**</FONT></SUP></FONT>&nbsp;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">See definitions of Free cash flow and 
Adjusted EBITDA in glossary and the respective reconciliations in Liquidity and 
Capital Resources and Reconciliation of Adjusted EBITDA.</FONT></P><FONT 
lang=PT-BR></FONT></DIV>
<a name="_bclFooter4"></a><DIV><FONT></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>4</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_5"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader5"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">RESULT BY BUSINESS SEGMENT</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">EXPLORATION &amp; PRODUCTION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The decrease in gross profit in the 1H-2016 was
generated by decreased Brent prices and by lower crude oil and NGL production in
Brazil and abroad. In addition, gross profit was impacted by higher depreciation
costs, partially offset by lower production taxes. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The decrease in operating income was due to 
lower gross profit. Excluding the effect of foreign exchange translation (25% 
depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar), operating expenses 
were higher as a result of increased idleness expenses related to drilling rigs,
to the expenses related to legal proceedings, to the new Voluntary Separation 
Incentive Plan and to higher expenses mainly due to the return of exploratory 
blocks.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Production</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Domestic crude oil and NGL production decreased
by 3% mainly due to higher realization of scheduled stoppages, mainly in P-48, 
P-53, FPSO Cid. Paraty and&nbsp; P-18 platforms.&nbsp; However, there were 
start-up and ramp-up of new systems, mainly FPSO Cid. </FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Itagua&#237; (Lula 
&#8211; Iracema Norte area), FPSO Cid. Maric&#225; (Lula Alto) and P-58 (Parque 
das Baleias). </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Natural gas 
production remained relatively flat because the scheduled stoppages mentioned 
above were mainly offset by increased gas production of P-58 (Parque das 
Baleias) and by the production start-up of FPSO Cid. Maric&#225; (Lula Alto). 
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Crude oil and
NGL production abroad decreased 12% mainly as a result of the sale/return of 
fields in Argentina, and of the scheduled stoppage of Akpo field in 
Nigeria.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gas 
production abroad increased 11% due to the production ramp-up in the Hadrian 
South field in the United States.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Lifting Cost </FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Lifting cost in U.S. dollar decreased due to
lower expenses with well intervention and with engineering and submarine 
maintenance, in addition to the higher share of pre-salt production, which has a
lower unit cost. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">In addition, 
production taxes decreased as a result of lower crude oil price.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Lifting cost 
decreased abroad due to the sale of the Austral Basin fields in Argentina, with 
higher operating costs, and to higher production in the United States, with 
lower costs.&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter5"></a><DIV><FONT></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>5</FONT></P>

<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 10pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="12%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none;

Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_7"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader7"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="HEIGHT: 128px; POSITION: absolute; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px; WIDTH: 809px">
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081122320200.jpg"
width=809 height=128></FONT><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></FONT></P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">REFINING, TRANSPORTATION AND MARKETING</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B></FONT><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross profit remained 
flat in the period, mainly due to the effects of foreign translation (25% 
depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar). Excluding these 
effects, gross profit increased due to a decrease in crude oil purchase/transfer
costs, following lower Brent prices, the lower share of crude oil imports on 
feedstock processing and the decreased share of oil products imports in our 
sales mix. These effects were partially offset by lower crude oil exports and by
lower economic activity in Brazil that decreased domestic oil products sales. 
</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating Income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B></FONT><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating income 
remained relatively flat in the period, mainly due to the effects of foreign 
translation (25% depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar). 
Excluding these effects, operating income increased in Brazilian Reais due to 
higher gross profit, partially offset by impairment of Comperj assets due to a 
reassessment of this project.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Imports and Exports of Crude Oil and Oil 
Products</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Improved</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">balance of crude oil 
exports (imports) net, due to lower imports, as a result of decreased volume 
processed and a higher share of domestic crude oil on feedstock processed. These
effects were partially offset by decreased export volume available, following 
lower production. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The decreased
deficit of oil products exports (imports), net was due to lower need of diesel 
import as a result of lower economic activity.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Refining Operations</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B></FONT><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Daily feedstock 
processed was 5% lower, due to scheduled stoppages, mainly in distillation 
plants of REPLAN and REVAP, partially offset by higher production of RNEST, as a
result of operating improvements made.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Refining Cost</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B></FONT><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Refining cost, as 
measured in US$/barrel, decreased by 14%. As measured in R$/barrel, refining 
cost increased by 7% mainly reflecting higher employee compensation costs 
attributable to the 2015/2016 Collective Bargaining Agreement, along with a 
decrease in feedstock processed.</FONT></FONT></P><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"></FONT>
<a name="_bclFooter7"></a><DIV><FONT></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>7</FONT></P>

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US

Transportation and Marketing Main Indicators</FONT></B></P>
<DIV align=left>

<TD style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="64%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-

<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2016</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="12%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2015</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="12%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2016 x 2015 (%)</FONT></P></TD></TR>

<DIV id=ftn6><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><SUP><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">*</FONT></SUP>&nbsp;See reconciliation in Reconciliation of 
Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA Statement by Segment.

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>8</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_9"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader9"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">GAS &amp; POWER</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B></FONT><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross profit decreased 
15% in the 1H-2016 when compared to the 1H-2015, mainly due to the effects of 
foreign translation (25% depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. 
dollar). Excluding these effects, gross profit increased 5% in Brazilian Reais, 
due to lower acquisition costs, mainly because of the reduction of natural gas 
and LNG imports. This effect was partially offset by lower natural gas sales to 
the thermoelectric sector and by decreased electricity generation due to the 
improvement of hydrological conditions in Brazil.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income decreased 11% in the 1H-2016 
when compared to the 1H-2015, mainly due to the effect of foreign translation 
(25% depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar). Excluding 
these effects, operating income increased 14% in Brazilian Reais due to higher 
gross profit and also to lower operating expenses. The 1H-2015 was mainly 
impacted by expenses from tax contingencies and impairment, partially offset by 
the reversal of impairment of trade receivables from companies in the 
electricity sector.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Physical and Financial Indicators 
</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Electricity sales to the Brazilian free 
contracting market (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de Contrata&#231;&#227;o Livre &#8211;
ACL</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">) were 5% lower, attributable to the termination of agreements. 
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Decreased 
electricity sales volumes to the Brazilian regulated market (</FONT><I><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de 
Contrata&#231;&#227;o Regulada &#8211; ACR</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">) was due to the 
termination of agreement representing 205 average MW, which occurred at 
Electricity Auction of 1H-2015.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The decreased
electricity generation and lower electricity prices in the spot market (PLD) 
were due to improved hydrological conditions.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">LNG imports 
decreased by 56% and natural gas imports from Bolivia were 10% lower, reflecting
a decrease in thermoelectric demand.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>9</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>

<TR>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-

<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(543)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="12%">

align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line"

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross profit decreased 29% in the 1H-2016 when 
compared to the 1H-2015. Excluding foreign translation effects (25% depreciation
of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar), gross profit decreased 11% in 
Brazilian Reais due to lower sales volumes in Brazil, caused by the lower 
economic activity which impacted industrial customers, in which the market share
of BR Distribuidora is higher than its competitors. These effects were partially
offset by improved results abroad, due to higher gross margin as a result of 
increased mix of sales products in Paraguay. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income in Brazil decreased as a 
result of higher losses with tax contingencies, partially offset by improved 
result abroad. &nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Market Share - Brazil</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015):</FONT></B></FONT><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif> </FONT></B><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Decreased market share 
was the result of lower sales to the thermoelectric sector and lower economic 
activity that mainly impacted industrial customers, in which the share of BR 
Distribuidora is higher than its competitors. In addition, the lower market 
share is a result of a shift in our sales policy to prioritize higher margins 
instead of sales volumes. </FONT></FONT></P><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT>
<a name="_bclFooter11"></a><DIV><FONT></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>

face=Calibri>11</FONT></P>

<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT:

<TD style="BACKGROUND: #bcbdbc; BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-
BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" 
width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">3,073</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">610</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">1,867</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">As of June 
30, 2016, the balance of cash and cash equivalents was US$ 19,609 million and 
the balance of adjusted cash and cash equivalents for the same period was US$ 
20,366 million. Our principal uses of funds in the 1H-2016 were for repayment of
long-term financing (and interest payments) and for capital expenditures. We 
partially met these requirements with cash provided by operating activities of 
US$ 10,679 million and with proceeds from long-term financing of US$ 9,100 
million. The balance of adjusted cash and cash equivalents was negatively 
impacted in the 1H-2016 by foreign exchange rate variation applied to our 
foreign financial investments. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net cash 
provided by operating activities of US$ 10,679 million was mainly generated by 
higher diesel and gasoline margins, lower production taxes in Brazil and lower 
crude oil, oil products and natural gas imports costs, along with a higher share
of domestic crude oil on feedstock processing. These effects were partially 
offset by lower crude oil and oil product exports prices and decreased sales 
volume in Brazil due to lower economic activity.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Capital 
expenditures and investments in investees were US$ 6,996 million in the 1H-2016 
(89% in E&amp;P business segment), a 41% decrease when compared to the 1H-
2015.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Free cash 
flow* was positive, amounting US$ 3,683 million in the 1H-2016, for the fifth 
consecutive quarter.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">From 
January to June 2016, the Company issued global notes in international capital 
markets totaling US$ 6.75 billion, with maturities of 5 and 10 years, and the 
proceeds of those notes offerings were used to tender for US$ 6.3 billion of 
Petrobras&#8217;s existing global notes. In addition, the Company entered into a
sale and leaseback operation with the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China 
(ICBC) in the amount of US$ 1 billion. The average maturity of outstanding debt 
was 7.30 years as of June 30, 2016 (7.14&nbsp; years as of December 31, 2015). 
It is important to mention the issuing of US$ 3 billion for tender offer at the 
same amount in July 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Repayments 
of interest and principal were US$ 19,159 million in the 1H-2016 and the nominal
cash flow (cash view), including principal and interest payments, by maturity, 
is set out in US$ million as follows:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>

<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_14"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader14"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Consolidated debt</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">As of June 
30, 2016, the gross debt in U.S. dollars decreased 2% and the net debt in U.S. 
dollars was 3% higher when compared to December 31, 2015.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Current debt 
and non-current debt include finance lease obligations of US$ 25 million and US$
98 million on June 30, 2016, respectively (US$ 19 million and US$ 78 million on 
December 31, 2015).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>

<DIV id=ftn10><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT color=#0000ff face=Symbol><SUP><FONT 
style="COLOR: #000000">*</FONT> </SUP></FONT>See definition of adjusted cash and
cash equivalents, net debt, total net liabilities and LTM Adjusted EBITDA in 
glossary and reconciliation in Reconciliation of Adjusted EBITDA.

&nbsp; <A name="page_15"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader15"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>

dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">ADDITIONAL 
INFORMATION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Reconciliation of Adjusted 
EBITDA</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted 
EBITDA is not a measure defined in the International Financial Reporting 
Standards &#8211; IFRS. Our calculation may not be comparable to the calculation
of Adjusted EBITDA by other companies and it should not be considered as a 
substitute for any measure calculated in accordance with IFRS. The Company 
reports its Adjusted EBITDA to give additional information about its 
profitability and must be considered in conjunction with other measures and 
indicators for a better understanding of the Company's financial performance. 
The Adjusted EBITDA is also a component of the Net debt / LTM adjusted EBITDA 
ratio, which is a metric included in the Company&#8217;s Business and Management
Plan.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">For interim 
financial periods, the Company calculates the last twelve months adjusted EBITDA
(LTM Adjusted EBITDA), consistently with market best practices.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 17.85pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 
-17.85pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted EBITDA</FONT></B></P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="37%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt; BACKGROUND: #006298; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; 
PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="63%" 
colSpan=7>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=white 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">U.S.$ million</FONT></B></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="37%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="27%" colSpan=3>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">First half of </FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="9%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none;

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">78</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 2.75pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt; HEIGHT: 23.25pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in" width="9%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">(359)</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">The decreased reclassification of foreign exchange variation expenses 
from the Shareholders&#8217; Equity to the Statement of Income was mainly due to
the fact that the 1Q-2016 was impacted by planned exports that were no longer 
expected to occur or did not occur, mainly due to the decrease in crude oil 
prices. Decreased planned export volumes were no longer expected to occur or did
not occur in the 2Q-2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Additional hedging relationships may be revoked or additional 
reclassification adjustments from equity to the Statement of Income may occur as
a result of changes in forecast export prices and export volumes following a 
review in the Company&#8217;s business plan. Based on a sensitivity analysis 
considering a US$ 10/barrel decrease in average Brent prices stress scenario, 
when compared to the Brent price projections in our most recent update of the 
2015-2019 Business and Management Plan (Plano de Neg&#243;cios e Gest&#227;o 
&#8211; PNG), a US$ 302 million reclassification adjustment from 
Shareholders&#8217; Equity to the statement of income would occur.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">The expected annual realization of the foreign exchange variation balance
in shareholders&#8217; equity, on June 30, 2016, is set out below:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%;
BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none" border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 13.5pt">
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt; 
HEIGHT: 13.5pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in" vAlign=bottom width="17%">
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" lang=EN-US color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt; 
BACKGROUND: #006298; HEIGHT: 13.5pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in" width="83%" colSpan=10>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=center><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=white face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">Consolidated</FONT></B></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 3.75pt">
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt; 
HEIGHT: 3.75pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in" vAlign=bottom width="17%">
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt; 
BACKGROUND: white; HEIGHT: 3.75pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in" vAlign=bottom width="9%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt; 
BACKGROUND: white; HEIGHT: 3.75pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in" vAlign=bottom width="9%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"

items are related to the Company&#8217;s businesses and based on
management&#8217;s judgement have been highlighted and are presented as 
additional information to provide a better understanding of the Company&#8217;s 
performance. These items are presented when relevant and do not necessarily 
occur in all periods.</FONT></P>
