dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">ADDITIONAL 
INFORMATION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">4. Results of 
Operations of 1H-2016 compared to 1H-2015:</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Virtually 
all revenues and expenses of our Brazilian operations are denominated and 
payable in Brazilian Reais. When the Brazilian Real depreciates relative to the 
U.S. dollar, as it did in the 1H-2016 (a 25% depreciation), revenues and 
expenses decrease when translated into U.S. dollars. Nevertheless, the 
depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar affects the line 
items discussed below in different ways.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Sales 
revenues were US$ 38,309 million in the 1H-2016, a 26% decrease (US$ 13,679 
million) when compared to US$ 51,988 million in the 1H-2015. Excluding the 
effects of foreign exchange translation, sales revenues decreased by 8% when 
expressed in Reais, due to:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Decreased domestic sales for oil 
products (7%), reflecting lower economic activity in Brazil and decreased diesel
and fuel oil consumption for thermoelectric generation;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Decreased electricity generation 
and prices due to improved hydrological conditions and decreased domestic 
natural gas sales volumes; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Lower crude oil and oil product 
export prices as a result of lower international crude oil prices.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">These 
effects were partially offset by higher margins of diesel and 
gasoline.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Cost of 
sales were US$ 26,434 million in the 1H-2016, a 26% decrease (US$ 9,407 million)
compared to US$ 35,841 million in the 1H-2015. Excluding the effects of foreign 
exchange translation, cost of sales decreased by 8% when expressed in Reais, due
to lower crude oil, oil products and natural gas import costs, as well as lower 
production taxes in Brazil. These effects were partially offset by higher 
depreciation expenses as a result of a decrease in estimated reserves (based on 
the unit of production method), partially offset by lower carrying amounts of 
assets impacted by the impairment losses recognized in 2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Selling 
expenses were US$ 2,010 million in the 1H-2016, an 8% increase (US$ 143 million)
compared to US$ 1,867 million in the 1H-2015. Excluding the effects of foreign 
exchange translation, selling expenses increased by 33% in the period, mainly 
due to the reversal of impairment of trade receivables from companies in the 
electricity sector in the 1Q-2015 (US$ 452 million) and higher freight expenses 
in 2016, following the depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. 
dollar.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Exploration
costs were US$ 761 million in the 1H-2016, a 5% decrease (US$ 44 million)
compared to US$ 805 million in the 1H-2015. Excluding the effects of foreign 
exchange translation, exploration costs increased by 16% in the period, mainly 
generated by return of exploratory blocks due to their economic 
viability.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Other taxes
were US$ 266 million in the 1H-2016, a 83% decrease (US$ 1,286 million) compared
to US$ 1,552 million in the 1H-2015 mainly due to the burden of tax on financial
operations (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Imposto sobre Opera&#231;&#245;es Financeiras - 
IOF</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">) applicable to intercompany loans made by Petrobras to foreign
subsidiaries and to the VAT tax (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Imposto sobre a Circula&#231;&#227;o de 
Mercadorias e Servi&#231;os</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">) on the acquisition of natural gas recognized 
in the 1H-2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Other 
income and expenses, net were US$ 2,945 million in the 1H-2016, a 43% increase 
(US$ 883 million) when compared to US$ 2,062 million in the 1H-2015.&nbsp; 
Excluding the effects of foreign exchange translation, other income and 
expenses, net increased by 76% in the period, mainly due to:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Higher unscheduled stoppages and 
pre-operating expenses, mainly with drilling rigs idleness (US$ 527 million); 
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Higher expenses related to legal 
proceedings contingencies, mainly in connection with labor and civil lawsuits 
(US$ 440 million); and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Expenses with the new Voluntary 
Separation Incentive Plan (US$ 346 million).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net finance
expense was US$ 3,950 million in the 1H-2016, remaining relatively flat compared
to US$ 3,932 million in the 1H-2015, due to the depreciation of the Brazilian 
Real against the U.S. dollar. Excluding the effect of foreign exchange 
translation, net finance expense increased 26% in Brazilian Reais due 
to:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Higher interest expenses due to 
higher debt and to the effect of the depreciation of the average Brazilian Real 
against the U.S. dollar; </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Foreign exchange gains generated 
by the impact of an 17.8% appreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. 
dollar on the Company&#8217;s net debt in the 1H-2016, compared to foreign 
exchange losses generated by the impact of a 16.8% depreciation in the 1H-
2015;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The higher reclassification of 
cumulative foreign exchange variation from shareholders&#8217; equity to net 
income due to occurred exports designated for cash flow hedge accounting, and to
a portion of future exports that were previously designated but were no longer 
expected to occur or did not occur;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Foreign exchange losses caused by 
the impact of a 1.4% depreciation of the U.S. dollar against the Euro on the 
Company&#8217;s net debt in the 1H-2016, compared to foreign exchange gains 
caused by the impact of an 8.2% appreciation in the 1H-2015; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Foreign exchange gains caused by 
the impact of an 10.7% appreciation of the U.S. dollar against the Pound 
Sterling on the Company&#8217;s net debt in the 1H-2016, compared to foreign 
exchange losses caused by the impact of a 0.9% depreciation in the 1H-
2015.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Share of 
earnings in equity-accounted investments were US$ 212 million in the 1H-2016, a 
84% increase (US$ 97&nbsp; million) when compared to US$ 115 million in the 1H-
2015.&nbsp; Excluding the effects of foreign exchange translation (25% 
depreciation of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar), share of earnings 
in equity-accounted investments increased by 130% in the period, mainly due to 
impairment&nbsp; losses in investee companies of Exploration and Production and 
Biofuels segments in the 1H-2015, as a result of decreased crude oil prices and 
higher discount rates, due to an increase in Brazil&#8217;s risk premium 
resulting from a credit risk downgrade (losing its investment grade 
status).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Income 
taxes (corporate income tax and social contribution) were US$ 234 million in the
1H-2016, a 88% decrease (US$ 1,692 million) compared to US$ 1,926 million in the
1H-2015, mainly due to lower taxable income before income taxes and decreased 
corporate income tax and social contribution tax expenses in Brazil over income 
earned abroad. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Loss 
related to non-controlling interests of US$ 372 million in the 1H-2016 (a US$ 
157 million gain in the 1H-2015), mainly reflecting the impact of foreign 
exchange variation on debt of structured entities in U.S. dollars in the 
period.</FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter18"></a><DIV><FONT></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>

</FONT></B></P>

face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">U.S.$ million</FONT></B></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="50%">

<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT:

<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-TOP: #006298 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 
0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2016</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-TOP: #006298 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 
0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2015</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BACKGROUND: #bcbdbc; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; 
PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2Q-2016</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">1Q-2016</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="10%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2Q-2015</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 10pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Sales revenues</FONT></P></TD>

<TD style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

colSpan=8>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none;

<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="8%">

medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras

face=Calibri>25</FONT></P>

<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_26"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader26"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg align=middle 
src="x16081122315400.jpg" width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="51%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Glossary </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ACL -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de Contrata&#231;&#227;o 
Livre</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> (Free contracting market) in the electricity 
system.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ACR -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de Contrata&#231;&#227;o 
Regulada</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> (Regulated contracting market) in the electricity 
system.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ANP</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">- </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE:
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Brazilian National Petroleum, Natural 
Gas and Biofuels Agency.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Reference feedstock or installed capacity of primary 
processing</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">-</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE:
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Maximum sustainable feedstock 
processing reached at the distillation units at the end of each period, 
respecting the project limits of equipment and the safety, environment and 
product quality requirements. It is lower than the authorized capacity set by 
ANP (including temporary authorizations) and by environmental protection 
agencies.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Feedstock processed (excluding NGL) - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Daily volume of crude 
oil processed in the Company&#180;s refineries in Brazil and is factored into 
the calculation of the Refining Plants Utilization Factor.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Feedstock processed &#8211; Brazil - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Daily volume of crude 
oil and NGL processed.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted cash and cash equivalents - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Sum of cash and cash 
equivalents, government bonds and time deposits from highly rated financial 
institutions abroad with maturities of more than 3 months from the date of 
acquisition, considering the expected realization of those financial investments
in the short-term. This measure is not defined under the International Financial
Reporting Standards &#8211; IFRS and should not be considered in isolation or as
a substitute for cash and cash equivalents computed in accordance with IFRS. It 
may not be comparable to adjusted cash and cash equivalents of other companies, 
however management believes that it is an appropriate supplemental measure that 
helps investors assess our liquidity and supports leverage 
management.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted EBITDA &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net income plus net finance income 
(expense); income taxes; depreciation, depletion and amortization; share of 
earnings in equity-accounted investments; and impairment. Adjusted EBITDA is not
a measure defined by IFRS and it is possible that it may not be comparable to 
similar measures reported by other companies. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Net debt &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross debt less adjusted cash and cash 
equivalents. Net debt is not a measure defined in the International Standards - 
IFRS and should not be considered in isolation or as a substitute for total 
long-term debt calculated in accordance with IFRS. Our calculation of net debt 
may not be comparable to the calculation of net debt by other companies. 
Management believes that net debt is an appropriate supplemental measure that 
helps investors assess our liquidity and supports leverage 
management.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Consolidated 
Structured Entities</FONT></B></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>-
</FONT></B></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"> </FONT></B></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">Entities that have been designated so that voting or similar 
rights are not the determining factor that decides who controls the entity. 
Petrobras has no share of earnings in investments in certain structured entities
that are consolidated in the financial statements, but the control is determined
by the power it has over its relevant operating activities. As there are no 
interests, the result came from certain consolidated structured entities is 
attributable to non-controlling interests in the income statement, and it is not
considered on net income attributable to shareholders of 
Petrobras.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Refining plants utilization factor (%) - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Feedstock processed 
(excluding NGL) divided by the reference feedstock.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Free cash flow -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Net cash provided by operating activities less
capital expenditures and investments in operating segments. Free cash flow is 
not defined under the International Financial Reporting Standards &#8211; IFRS 
and should not be considered in isolation or as a substitute for cash and cash 
equivalents calculated in accordance with IFRS. It may not be comparable to free
cash flow of other companies, however management believes that it is an 
appropriate supplemental measure that helps investors assess our liquidity and 
supports leverage management.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="49%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LPG - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Liquified crude oil gas.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LNG</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">- </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE:
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Liquified natural gas.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Operating indicators - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Indicators used for businesses 
management and</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE:
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">are not reviewed by independent auditor.
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">NGL - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Natural gas liquids.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Lifting Cost -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Crude oil and natural gas lifting cost 
indicator.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LTM Adjusted EBITDA </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">&#8211; Sum of the last 12 months (Last Twelve 
Months) of Adjusted EBITDA.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Basic and diluted earnings (losses) per share - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Calculated based on
the weighted average number of shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Operating margin</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> - Calculated based on operating income (loss) 
excluding write-offs of overpayments incorrectly capitalized.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted EBITDA margin -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Adjusted EBITDA divided by sales 
revenues. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Market share - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Relation between Distribution sales and total 
market.</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Beginning in 2015, our market share excludes 
sales made to wholesalers. Market share for prior periods was revised pursuant 
to the changes made </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face=arial,sans-serif>&#8203;&#8203;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">by the Brazilian National Petroleum, 
Natural Gas and Biofuels Agency (ANP) and by the Brazilian Wholesalers and Fuel 
Traders Syndicate (Sindicom). Prior periods are presented based on the new 
methodology.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Total liabilities net - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Total liability less</FONT><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> 
</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">adjusted cash and cash equivalents.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">PLD (differences settlement price)</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">-
</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"> Electricity price in the spot market. Weekly weighed prices per output 
level (light, medium and heavy), number of hours and related market 
capacity.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Domestic crude oil sales price - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Average between the prices of 
exports and the internal transfer prices from Exploration &amp; Production to 
Refining, Transportation and Marketing.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Domestic natural gas production</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> - Natural gas production in 
Brazil less LNG plus gas reinjection.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Jet fuel &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Aviation fuel.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Net Income by Business Segment - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Company&#8217;s segment results. 
Petrobras is an integrated energy company and most of the crude oil and natural 
gas production from the Exploration &amp; Production segment is transferred to 
other business segments of the Company. Our results by business segment include 
transactions carried out with third parties, transactions between companies of 
Petrobras&#8217;s Group and transfers between Petrobras&#8217;s business 
segments that are calculated using internal prices defined through methodologies
based on market parameters. On April 28, 2016, the Extraordinary General Meeting
approved the statutory adjustments according to the new organizational structure
of the company and its new management and governance model, to align the 
organization to the new reality of the oil and gas sector and prioritize 
profitability and capital discipline. The new management model does not provide 
for the discontinuance of the Company's business, but involves unification 
activities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">On June 30, 2016, the presentation related to the business segment 
information reflects the top management assessment related to the performance 
and the business resources allocation. Due to the adjustments occurred in 
corporate structure and governance and management model, this presentation may 
be reevaluated in order to enhance the business management analysis.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7.5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV><FONT lang=PT-BR><BR clear=all></FONT></DIV></DIV>

style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>

<DIV align=center><FONT color=#000000 size=3 face=Arial><B>FORWARD-LOOKING 
STATEMENTS </B></FONT></DIV>
<P>This press release may contain forward-looking statements within the meaning 
of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (Securities Act), and 
Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (Exchange Act) 
that are not based on historical facts and are not assurances of future 
results.&nbsp; These forward-looking statements are based on management's 
current view and estimates of future economic circumstances, industry 
conditions, company performance and financial results. The words "anticipates", 
"believes", "estimates", "expects", "plans" and similar expressions, as they 
relate to the company, are intended to identify forward-looking statements. 
Statements regarding the declaration or payment of dividends, the implementation
of principal operating and financing strategies and capital expenditure plans, 
the direction of future operations and the factors or trends affecting financial
condition, liquidity or results o f operations are examples of forward-looking 
statements. Such statements reflect the current views of management and are 
subject to a number of risks and uncertainties. There is no guarantee that the 
expected events, trends or results will actually occur. The statements are based
on many assumptions and factors, including general economic and market 
conditions, industry conditions, and operating factors. Any changes in such 
assumptions or factors could cause actual results to differ materially from 
current expectations.&nbsp; <BR>All forward-looking statements are expressly 
qualified in their entirety by this cautionary statement, and you should not 
place reliance on any forward-looking statement contained in this press release.
We undertake no obligation to publicly update or revise any forward-looking 
statements, whether as a result of new information or future events or for any 
other reason.</P>
